package.name: KSC5601
package.summary: Manipulation character set between KSC5601 and UTF-8
package.description: Manipulation character set between KSC5601 and UTF-8. KSC5601 pear package also enables to convert UCS2, NCR code between Unicode and UTF8 or KSC5601.
package.notes: * Add ascii only check mode in UTF8::is_utf8 API * change method name KSC5601::out_of_ksc1001 to KSC5601::out_of_ksx1001 * add multibyte(CJK unicode and EUC-KR/EUC-JP) KSC5601::substr() method * fixed wrong check KSC4501::is_ksc5601() method

release.notes: * Add ascii only check mode in UTF8::is_utf8 API * change method name KSC5601::out_of_ksc1001 to KSC5601::out_of_ksx1001 * add multibyte(CJK unicode and EUC-KR/EUC-JP) KSC5601::substr() method * fixed wrong check KSC4501::is_ksc5601() method
* fixed wrong utf8 check UTF8::is_utf8 API * changed internal KSC5601 class to KSC5601_ext and KSC5601_pure * changed comments to english * add is_ksc5601 and is_ksx1001 method

* interal API version update to 2.0 * not compotable 1.0.x * devided iconv/mbstring mode and Pure code * change UCS4 to UCS2 (include api name) * Changed noKSX1001 method to out_of_ksx1001 * Removed usePure method * Deprecated toucs2 method. (use ucs($stinrg, UCS2[, $enc)) * Deprecated todeucs2 method. (use ucs($stinrg, UHC)) * Deprecated toncr method. (use ncr($stinrg, UHC[, $enc)) * Deprecated todencr method. (use ncr($stinrg, UHC)) * Deprecated utf8enc method. (use utf8 ($stinrg, UTF8))) * Deprecated utf8dec method. (use utf8 ($stinrg, UHC)))

* fixed wrong check 2byte utf-8 on is_utf8 method * bom code check on is_utf8 method * change UCS4 to UCS2 (include api name) * support convert ucs2 with native iconv or mbstring * no release this version
